item.description:
In the spirit of the old Summit Ave Hills meetup from last summer, we're bringing back the hills. However, just say no to repeats! This is an 8.9 mile run that has approximately 987 feet of vertical ascent and four great hills of Brookline. Our group will determine the speed, and everyone is welcome. This is a super fun route.

Some highlights of the run:

Corey Outlook Park at Summit Ave Hill
Schick Park at Aspinwall Hill
Fisher Hill near Newbury College
Nice neighborhood around Chestnut Hill

Meet at 6 pm at Unos at the corner of Harvard and Commonwealth Ave in Allston.

Call (857.540.2822) or email me if you have any questions! Hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: In my running duds, feelin' froggy.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: The Hills of Brookline
